Description: Alexander Wong Coronavirus, Canada Evidence is mounting to support a mixing and matching approach with AstraZeneca followed by Pfizer being at least as good (if not better) than giving two doses of the same vaccine People in Canada whose first dose of COVI
Title: AstraZeneca Second Dose Should I Get The Same Vaccine or Choose Pfizer or Moderna
Author: Alexander Wong

Description: A population based study, published in the Journal of the American Medical Association (JAMA), has found flu vaccination during pregnancy does not lead to an increased risk of adverse early childhood health outcomes
Title: No Risk For Kids Born To Mothers Given Flu Jabs During Pregnancy Study
Author: No Data Available

Description: A Winnipeg police officer is being charged for driving imprudently, after a motor vehicle collision that left a man with a broken pelvis and broken back last December, said Manitoba's main police oversight body in a news release Wednesday
Title: Winnipeg police officer charged under Traffic Act after crash that left man with broken back
Author: CBC News

Description: Home sales in New Brunswick in recent months have been high and not reserved to the larger cities, as people from western provinces ditch large urban centres to buy property in the more rural, scenic parts of the province
Title: Canadians wanting scenery, not city life, driving record home sales in small town N B
Author: Robert Jones

Description: Speaking to the Board of Police Commissioners on Monday, Dan Kinsella said local officers are trained to investigate hate crimes, and incidents such as hate graffiti are tracked
Title: Hate crimes underreported, Halifax police chief tells board of commissioners
Author: Pam Berman
